cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 3367, Gold Star Children Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 88 (Thursday, May 20, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. TAYLOR:
H.R. 3367.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Artlcle I, Section 8, Clause 18 of the United States
[Page H2652]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported in the Nature of a Substitute (Amended) by Voice Vote.
